verify-email.title: Verify email

verify-email.text4: If you’re having trouble clicking the button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:

login.unverified: Your account is not verified. Please check your email

forgot-password.title: Forgot password
forgot-password.success: If your email is registered, you will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password
forgot-password.text2: You’re using our password reset service
forgot-password.text3: Simply click the big green button below to reset your password.
